function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of graphene-based products with SARS-CoV-2 during manufacturing or handling","Impact":"Spread of the virus to users of the products, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to disinfection protocols and testing for virus presence in the products","Technologies":"Disinfection methods, rapid virus detection tools","People":"Manufacturers, handlers, users of graphene-based products","Owner":"Manufacturers, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Incomplete or insufficient inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 on graphene-based coatings","Impact":"Failure to prevent virus transmission, leading to continued spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Thorough testing of coating effectiveness and quality control measures during production","Technologies":"Virus inactivation testing methods, quality control technologies","People":"Manufacturers, users of graphene-based coatings","Owner":"Manufacturers, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate disposal or recycling of graphene-based antiviral coatings","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and potential exposure to harmful materials","Mitigation":"Proper guidelines for disposal and recycling, monitoring of environmental impact","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring tools, sustainable disposal and recycling technologies","People":"Environmental agencies, waste management facilities, users of graphene-based coatings","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, waste management authorities"}]}
